Room.Name: Hafnia Circle Road/Rue Caledonia Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hafnia circle road, which encircles the City of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: This road goes clear around the city. Immediately to the west is Jacob's Repair Shoppe, where you may have an elven smith work on your weapons and armor. There is a field behind the shoppe, but you cannot enter it from here. It seems to be some kind of training grounds. A lot of people are coming and going further north.
